titleInfo.title: State Child Care and Early Education Developments: Highlights and Updates for 1998

location.physicalLocation: Langston Hughes Library (Children's Defense Fund Haley Farm)

mods.abstract: This report is one of a series of reports by CDF concerning state policies and practices in child care and education. The report provides highlights and updates regarding state actions on child care and early education issues during 1998. The report is intended to serve as a supplement and companion to the more comprehensive information presented in State Developments in Child Care and Early Education 1997. The information in the report was collected through written surveys and phone interviews with advocates in each state. The final draft was reviewed for verification by advocates and state child care administrators in each state.

subject.topic: Federal aid to day care centers

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Langston Hughes Library (Children's Defense Fund Haley Farm)
